abcexport-i18n-welcome: Used to greet the user when reading the i18n/??.json file.
abc_export_link: Toolbox link text for abc export
pdf_export_link: Toolbox link text for pdf export
tag_tune_link: Toolbox link text for Tag tune
multi_export_link: Toolbox link text for Export multiple tunes
abc_special_page_title: second header after special page title (if wanted)
abc_export_text: abcExport Special page instructions to user, to enter page names
abc_export_text2: abcExport additional Special page instructions, shown when have session manager state
abc_filename: Text before the requested output file name field
abc_format_txt: Export format option: tune name list
